      • getUseScope

        public SearchScope getUseScope(PsiElement element)
        Description copied from interface: PsiSearchHelper
        Returns the scope in which references to the specified element are searched. This scope includes the result of PsiElement.getUseScope() and also the results returned from the registered com.intellij.psi.search.UseScopeEnlarger instances.
        Specified by:
        getUseScope in interface PsiSearchHelper
        Parameters:
        element - the element to return the use scope form.
        Returns:
        the search scope instance.

      • processCandidateFilesForText

        public boolean processCandidateFilesForText(GlobalSearchScope scope,
                                            short searchContext,
                                            boolean caseSensitively,
                                            java.lang.String text,
                                            Processor<? super VirtualFile> processor)
        Description copied from interface: PsiSearchHelper
        Given a text, scope and other search flags, runs the processor on all indexed files that contain all words from the text. Note that this doesn't mean the files contain the text itself.
        Specified by:
        processCandidateFilesForText in interface PsiSearchHelper

                                           PsiNonJavaFileReferenceProcessor processor,
                                           GlobalSearchScope searchScope)
        Description copied from interface: PsiSearchHelper
        Passes all occurrences of the specified full-qualified class name in plain text context to the specified processor.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        qName - the class name to search.
        processor - the processor which accepts the references.
        searchScope - the scope in which occurrences are searched.

      • processUsagesInNonJavaFiles

        public boolean processUsagesInNonJavaFiles(PsiElement originalElement,
                                           java.lang.String qName,
                                           PsiNonJavaFileReferenceProcessor processor,
                                           GlobalSearchScope initialScope)
        Description copied from interface: PsiSearchHelper
        Passes all occurrences of the specified fully qualified class name in plain text context in the use scope of the specified element to the specified processor.
        Specified by:
        processUsagesInNonJavaFiles in interface PsiSearchHelper
        Parameters:
        originalElement - the element whose use scope is used to restrict the search scope, or null if the search scope is not restricted.
        qName - the class name to search.
        processor - the processor which accepts the references.
        initialScope - the scope in which occurrences are searched.
